artist: Hirata Gyokuun; Author: inscribed by Rai San'yō
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription: inscription URQ, in Japanese: (胝?)驚胡蝶認（嫣?)（病?)依仰猶(到?)/咲??(鎖髪?)鬟烟黯淡玉階裙帯月黄?(浗?)羞炩(火?)春女夢華帳香騰把返亮最是秋千日(科?)?；和它花龍出芳園
markings: Japanese inscription on L side when rolled; URC, oval relief; upper center:??流水　two square relief:頼襄, 子成; LR edge, square reliefs; LRC, square intaglio
medium: Hanging scroll (nikuhitsu), ink and color on silk
signed: UC: 山陽外史題; LRC: 玉蘊
title: Standing Beauty
